response.overview: Erika Lust presents the ultimate couple's fantasy. In 'It Takes Three to Tango' a promiscuous couple is getting seduced by their tango teacher. The film masterfully combines aesthetics with the eroticism of dance and the art of seduction. Inspired by a real confession submitted to Erika Lustâ€™s site XConfessions.com, this erotic movie will make you want to realise your own most personal sexual fantasies.
response.title: It Takes Three To Tango
